articles.description: President Donald Trump finally wore a mask in public during a visit to wounded service members at Walter Reed. But he continues to sow confusion by minimizing the impact of the coronavirus and pushing for the reopening of schools.

articles.title: Usman eases past Masvidal on UFC 'Fight Island' debut
articles.description: The "Nigerian Nightmare" might not have given his opponent a terribly bad dream but he still eased to victory in the main event on the debut of UFC's "Fight Island."

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Historians will likely rank Trump as one of the worst presidents
articles.description: Poll of the week: A new Gallup poll puts President Donald Trump's approval rating at 38%. His disapproval rating stands at 57%.

articles.author: Jennifer Henderson, CNN
articles.title: Three Arizona teachers who shared a classroom got coronavirus. One of them died
articles.description: Three teachers who shared a summer classroom at a school in Arizona all contracted coronavirus last month, leaving one of them dead.

articles.title: Florida woman took dishwashing job so she could visit husband with Alzheimer's during pandemic
articles.description: Mary Daniel visited her husband Steve every day at his Florida memory care center until they stopped allowing visitors in March because of the coronavirus pandemic.
